sn24.36:1.2: “Kismiṃ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṃ upādāya, kiṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.36:1.3: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.36:2.1: “Rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṃ upādāya, rūpaṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.36:2.2: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
sn24.36:2.6: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṃ upādāya, viññāṇaṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.36:2.7: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti.
sn24.36:3.4: api nu taṃ anupādāya evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.36:3.5: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.36:3.7: “Iti kho, bhikkhave, dukkhe sati, dukkhaṃ upādāya, dukkhaṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.36:3.8: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
sn24.36:3.14: api nu taṃ anupādāya evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.36:3.15: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.36:3.17: “Iti kho, bhikkhave, dukkhe sati, dukkhaṃ upādāya dukkhaṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.36:3.18: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
